mapper.select: select u.f_id userId, ln.f_user_account username, ln.f_user_pwd password,ln.f_type accountType,ln.f_wechat_union_id unionId, r.f_role_code roleCode, r.f_id roleId, r.f_role_name roleName, u.f_nick_name nickName from t_login_no ln inner join t_user u ON ln.f_user_id = u.f_id and u.f_sys_del_state = 0 left join t_user_role ur ON ur.f_sys_del_state = 0 and ur.f_user_id = u.f_id left join t_role r ON r.f_sys_del_state = 0 and r.f_role_state = 1 and ur.f_role_id = r.f_id and r.f_system_code = #{systemCode} where ln.f_sys_del_state = 0 and ln.f_user_account = #{username} and ln.f_type = #{accountType} order by ln.f_id desc , u.f_id desc limit 1

select ru.f_url url, r.f_id roleId, r.f_role_name roleName, r.f_role_code roleCode from t_role_resource rr inner join t_resource_url ru on ru.f_sys_del_state = 0 and ru.f_id = rr.f_resource_url_id inner join t_role r on r.f_sys_del_state = 0 and r.f_role_state = 1 and r.f_id = rr.f_role_id where rr.f_sys_del_state = 0 and r.f_system_code = #{systemCode} and ru.f_system_code = #{systemCode}
